I know. I've started on that Highlander rpg, and brought in a char 
from one of my favorite Highlander fanfic sites, but when he went in 
to talk to Joe Dawson no one could post for him. And by the way do you 
believe Proto humans should be banned? I feel they are underused. What 
about Homo Dominant (that was 99% kidding if you've never seen the 
show "Prey" don't worry about it if you have what if some of them came 
back in time?)?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Vincent Price" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Yo. I listened to what you said. Well. I must forewarn you. In 
my old RPG, NBMSSO, I thought the exact same thing. Earth was 
overdone, time to go to Cybertron. But guess what? Going to Cybertron 
MURDERED my RPG. It became uninteresting, nobody wanted to post 
anymore, and even I became uninterested with my characters being on 
Cybertron. Trust me man, don't do it, Cybertron is a deathbed...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Legendarynemasis@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Wednesday, November 21, 2001 9:43 AM
>   Subject: Re: Debate (important everyone read)
> 
> 
>            Err.. Damn AOL making a send button over a reply button 
making me send a blank email. Now then Dewboy to answer your question. 
No, I would not. As by becoming a council member I would essence be 
becoming a GM. Everyone would get a fair chance whether or not I liked 
them or didnt like them. Although if someone decides to needlessly 
piss me off about some matter within the RPG, such as how when me and 
you were making all those useless OOCs I would give them 3 chances, 
one warning, a second warning, and then a modration, and if they 
continue to do the same thing again I would set a motion to have them 
booted from the RPG. 
> 
>            Also I would also like to let people no my motives for 
joining the council. Although I have been in this RPG a short duration 
compared to some I can see now that the people who participate are 
really treated like children rather than adults. Seriously, no 
interception of weapons fire? Sure it got bad a while back, but you 
know what people who are on the council should suck it up and deal 
with the problem instead of just making a rule that cuts down on 
gameplay. How could someone do that? Well one could give them a 
warning if they were abusing the weapons fire interception, then if 
they persisted in abusing the thing they could get moderated, and then 
if they continued, just remove them from the RPG as apparently they 
don't wish to be fair. 
> 
>            What would happen to the charachters of the abusive 
person removed? Either A, give them someone, B recruit someone to take 
them, or C Take responsibility for them. Seriously it isnt that hard 
to control fifty charachters I have about three times that in an 
EZBoard Beast Wars RPG. That is because I control all the predacons as 
noone not even the other GM would take any of them and the only other 
person who did have some has mysteriously dissapeared, I control 
around 3/4ths of the maximals again because the otehr GM is lazy, and 
I also control a whole slew of custom charachters either I designed 
and made or someone else did and are no longer in the RPG.
> 
>            Also, I would like to help the RPG finally get off the 
god damn planet Earth and back to Cybertron but not following the 
Beast Machines story line. To me the thing was just too freakishly 
annoying and I believe only some of the later first season was 
actually good. Earth has been overdone, and the storyline this RPG was 
supposed to follow has been butchered and destroyed and looks nothing 
like the story I saw. And as for more charachters popping up from 
ships? Seriously do you know how unlikely it is that all these ships 
would be hitting the same god damn planet? Who here thinks we should 
move on to something other than past Earth or Earth in Particular?
> 
>            Also I find the whole no hostile drone rule ridiculous to 
even have up there. Its BW people undestand there should be no drones 
at all really. And as for offensive ones? Well, They should ask the 
council first as that would be a logical idea. To make things short if 
im elected for council I am going to try to change things Ill try to 
get RPers treated more as adults rather then the imature kids that I 
feel they are being treated like now. Any more questions? Comments?
